Title change from The Voyage of Doctor Dolittle to simply Dolittle in August.
Prior to this, Universal had turned towards Seth Rogen and Neighbors co-writer Brendan O'Brien to help add comedy to the film, but neither could remain committed to the project and dropped out.
Experience said that the inspiration for the Dr. Dolittle character stemmed from a Welsh neo-pagan physician called William Price.
